sourcesContent:
<template>
  <main id="main-game">
    <sweet-game-sequence :sequenceToFind="sequenceToFind" />
    <sweet-game-cells
      v-if="playerSequence?.length"
      :playerSequence="playerSequence"
    />
    <sweet-game-buttons @drawShape="onDrawShape" @reverse="onReverse" />
  </main>
</template>

<script>
import { defineComponent, ref, onMounted } from "vue";
import SweetGameSequence from "@/components/SweetGameSequence.vue";
import SweetGameCells from "@/components/SweetGameCells.vue";
import SweetGameButtons from "@/components/SweetGameButtons.vue";
import { SHAPES, START_SEQUENCE_LENGTH } from "@/helpers/game.constants";
import { random } from "@/helpers/utils.js";

export default defineComponent({
  name: "GameView",
  components: { SweetGameSequence, SweetGameCells, SweetGameButtons },
  setup() {
    let sequenceLength = START_SEQUENCE_LENGTH;
    let sequenceToFind = ref([]);
    let playerSequence = ref([]);
    let score = ref(0);

    function resetGame() {
      sequenceToFind.value = generateStartingSequence(sequenceLength);
      playerSequence.value = resetPlayerSequence(sequenceToFind.value.length);
    }

    function generateStartingSequence(sequenceLength) {
      const generatedSequence = [];
      for (let i = 0; i < START_SEQUENCE_LENGTH; i++) {
        let indexOfShape = Math.floor(random(0, Object.keys(SHAPES).length));
        generatedSequence.push(Object.values(SHAPES)[indexOfShape]);
      }
      return generatedSequence;
    }

    function resetPlayerSequence(sequenceLength) {
      return Array.apply(null, Array(sequenceLength)).map(() => {
        return null;
      });
    }

    function onDrawShape(shape) {
      console.log("On Draw Shape ! ", shape, playerSequence.value);
      const index = playerSequence.value.findIndex((shape) => shape === null);

      if (index > -1) {
        playerSequence.value[index] = shape;
      } else {
        playerSequence.value = resetPlayerSequence(sequenceToFind.value.length);
      }

      if (!playerSequence.value.at(-1)) {
        validateSequence();
      }
    }

    function validateSequence() {
      if (
        JSON.stringify(playerSequence.value) ===
        JSON.stringify(sequenceToFind.value)
      ) {
        console.log("WIN !");
      } else {
        console.log("LOOSE !");
      }
    }

    function onReverse() {
      let playerSequenceCopy = [...playerSequence.value];
      playerSequenceCopy.forEach((shape, index) => {
        switch (shape) {
          case SHAPES.STAR:
            playerSequence.value[index] = SHAPES.TRIANGLE;
            break;
          case SHAPES.SQUARE:
            playerSequence.value[index] = SHAPES.CIRCLE;
            break;
          case SHAPES.TRIANGLE:
            playerSequence.value[index] = SHAPES.STAR;
            break;
          case SHAPES.CIRCLE:
            playerSequence.value[index] = SHAPES.SQUARE;
            break;
        }
      });
    }

    onMounted(() => {
      resetGame();
      console.log("PLAYER SEQUENCE ", playerSequence.value.at(-1));
    });
    return { sequenceToFind, playerSequence, onDrawShape, onReverse };
  },
});
</script>
